text:
D. Hariharan (3) of Valli nagar in TVS Nagar, near Edayarpalayam, who is said to have consumed some poisonous substances near his house on Tuesday died at the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Friday. Thudiyalur Police said that he was the fourth son for his parents Dhramaraj (32) and Lakshmi.

The police said that on Tuesday the couple left their five sons in school and balwadi and went to work. On returning home in the evening they saw Hariharan unconscious and learnt that he drank some oil like substance from a garbage dump in front of their house. He was rushed to the hospital where he died under treatment on Friday.
title: Boy consumes poison
